metadata.title: CVE-2016-6254 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Heap-based buffer overflow in the parse_packet function in network.c incollectd before 5.4.3 and 5.x before 5.5.2 allows remote attackers to causea denial of service (daemon crash) or possibly execute arbitrary code via acrafted network packet.

criterions.comment: collectd: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
